typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Flight#} as string,
		Origin as string,
		Dest as string,
		FlightDate as date 'dd-MM-yyyy',
		NoSalesReason as string,
		TransmittingFlightAttd as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(MonthsSinceFlight = toInteger(round((monthsBetween(currentDate(), FlightDate, true())))),
		numberofattendants = 123) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		year as string,
		AvgComedyRating as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
